p: Fill-in-the-blank questions on the identification of 15 herbal plants were provided in this section. Documented photos from previous field trips were used here. All of the students completed the warm-up test during the briefing session. Scores on the warm-up test were considered the baseline test result of the study. The warm-up test was used only to evaluate students’ knowledge of herbal plant identification before the field trip—not for course assessment.
